product_name: Delta Kayaks Delta 17 Kayak with Rudder
long_description: Suited for mid- to large-framed paddlers, the Delta 17 features a V-shaped hull, pronounced chine and moderate rocker that deliver a smooth transition to edge and offer impressive tracking and speed.
short_description: Suited for mid- to large-framed paddlers, the Delta 17 features a V-shaped hull, pronounced chine and moderate rocker that deliver a smooth transition to edge and offer impressive tracking and speed.
